overview: DEE DAVIS INC is a certified EDWOSB specializing in medical and healthcare supplies for VA facilities and government healthcare agencies. Since 2018, we have provided critical medical products with reliable delivery, competitive pricing, and unwavering commitment to supporting our nation's veterans.

core_competencies.title: Medical Supplies & Equipment
core_competencies.description: Diagnostic supplies, patient care products, PPE, surgical supplies, examination room equipment

core_competencies.title: VA Contract Experience
core_competencies.description: Proven track record with VA facilities | GSA Schedule expertise | Veteran-focused service delivery

core_competencies.title: Healthcare Supply Chain
core_competencies.description: Specialized medical distribution | Cold chain management | Emergency stock availability

benefits.title: Healthcare Expertise
benefits.description: Specialized knowledge of VA medical supply requirements and regulations

benefits.title: Rapid Response
benefits.description: 3-5 day delivery to most VA facilities | Emergency order capability

benefits.title: Quality Assurance
benefits.description: 100% FDA-compliant products | Full traceability | Lot tracking

certifications: EDWOSB (Economically Disadvantaged Women-Owned Small Business) - SBA Certified
commitment: DEE DAVIS INC is honored to serve our nation's veterans through reliable delivery of quality medical supplies. We are committed to supporting VA facilities with competitive pricing, rapid response to urgent needs, and professional service that reflects our respect for those who have served our country.
